title: Formulation of a National Human Resources and Employment Policy, Strategy and an Action Plan
decision_details:
- the objectives of this programme are as follows: 

*	to provide an integrated policy framework towards promoting employment. 
*	to enable all men and women to attain full productive and freely chosen employment and work. 
*	to promote productivity among our people to improve competitiveness and enhance employability. 
*	to provide fullest possible opportunities to a worker to qualify for and to use his/her skills in a job for which he/she is well suited. 

The above proposal made by Hon. D.E.W. Gunasekara, Minister (Senior) for Human  Resources, was approved by the Cabinet.
